title: Performance Optimization
prompt:
Perform comprehensive performance optimization:

[PASTE CODE HERE]

Analysis:
1. Performance profiling and bottlenecks
2. Code-level optimization
3. Memory optimization
4. I/O optimization (database, caching)
5. Network optimization
6. Frontend optimization (bundle size, lazy loading)
7. Backend optimization (indexing, caching)
8. Benchmarking (before/after metrics)

Provide detailed report and optimized code.
example: Optimize slow API endpoint processing large datasets
